Title: 【Instagram如何快速涨粉？】Instagram最新算法完全解析｜ Instagram教学

Content.Text: Instagram's algorithm is based on user behavior, such as interactions, engagement, and frequency of use. It aims to present users with content that is most relevant to their interests.
The algorithm considers five factors: interest, relationships, timeliness, usage frequency, and tracked accounts. These factors influence the content displayed on users' feeds.

To leverage the algorithm for growth, create engaging content, maintain a consistent posting schedule, and interact with followers. Use relevant hashtags and track accounts that align with your niche.
While videos may have higher engagement, images can be more visually appealing. Consider using both formats to cater to different user preferences.
Encourage interaction by asking questions, responding to comments, and utilizing Instagram's features like polls and questions. This helps build a stronger connection with your audience.
Hashtags help increase your content's visibility by reaching users who are interested in your niche. Experiment with different hashtags to find the ones that work best for your account.
Maintain a consistent posting schedule and focus on creating high-quality content that resonates with your audience. This will help retain and attract new followers.
